div.p: Jasper County’s Construction and Demolition landfill is temporarily closed due to Governor Kemp’s statewide Shelter in Place Executive Order. This order expires April 13th at 11:59 p.m.
The free month of landfill tipping will be considered for a different month after the Shelter in Place order expires.
Jasper County’s Solid Waste curbside pick-up service will continue uninterrupted.
